Chiagozie Fred Nwonwu onye na-ede n'okpuru aha edemede Mazi Nwonwu bụ onye edemede, onye nlekọta na onye nchịkọta akụkọ Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Omenana Magazine. N'afọ 2017, YNaija depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị kachasị ike na mgbasa ozi n'akụkụ Stephanie Busari na Fisayo Soyombo
A mụrụ Chiagozie Nwonwu na Nkwe, N'ime obodo di na
Ọ gara Government College, Kaduna (nke bụzi Barewa College) wee gaa na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe iji mmaka ihe gbasara asụsụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Olisa.tv

Ya na Chinelo Onwualu hiwere Omenana Magazine n'afọ 2014. Ọ bụkwa onye nta akụkọ na BBC. BBC kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị edemede ọhụrụ ahụ dere Nigeria. A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ọgbọ nke atọ nke ndị edemede Naịjirịa.
